contextId.occurrenceNote: If it would be clearer in your language, you could express the idea behind the abstract nouns **grace**, **mercy**, and **peace** with verbal phrases, with **God the Father** and **Jesus Christ** as the subject. Alternate translation: “May God the Father and Jesus Christ show us kindness, be merciful to us, and give us peace” (See: [Abstract Nouns](rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns))
contextId.quoteString: ἔσται μεθ’ ἡμῶν χάρις, ἔλεος, εἰρήνη, παρὰ Θεοῦ Πατρός καὶ παρὰ Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ
contextId.glQuote: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ

gatewayLanguageQuote: Grace, mercy, and peace will be … us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ

selections.text: ಯೇಸು ಕ್ರಿಸ್ತನಿಂದಲೂ ಕೃಪೆಯು, ಕರುಣೆಯು, ಮತ್ತು ಶಾಂತಿಯು,
